quotes.quote: Don't believe what your eyes are telling you. All they show is limitation. Look with your understanding, find out what you already know, and you'll see the way to fly.
Art consists of limitation. The most beautiful part of every picture is the frame.
Age is no barrier. It's a limitation you put on your mind.
In imagination, there's no limitation.
All limitations are self-imposed.
Your limitations create your sound.
Your limitation lies in your imagination.
The man who knows his limitations, has none.
Limitation makes the creative mind inventive.
There are no limitations to any of our dreams.
The enemy of art is the absence of limitations.
There are no limitations to the mind except those that we acknowledge.
All conceptions are limitations of the conceiver.
If you accept your limitations you go beyond them.
The limitations in life do not necessary limit you.
Understand your limitations and capitalize on them.
Most of the time, our limitations are self-imposed.
When we argue for our limitations, we get to keep them.
People mistake their limitations for high standards.
The wise know their limitations; the foolish do not.
To understand the limitation of things, desire them.
The new limitations are the human ones of perception.
There are no limitations, just dreams to be fulfilled.
Every limitation must be overcome to realised the goal.
Limited minds can recognize limitations only in others.
To be aware of limitations is already to be beyond them.
Challenge your limitations for the pure joy of challenge.
The mind that perceives the limitation is the limitation.
Limitations imply possibilities. A problem is a challenge.
A barrier is a limitation only when you perceive it as one.
